mapper.insert: insert into user_branch(branch_name, branch_desc, created_by, created_on, updated_by, updated_on) values(#{branchName}, #{branchDesc}, #{createdBy}, #{createdOn}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedOn})
mapper.sql: ub.id as id, ub.branch_name as branchName, ub.branch_desc as branchDesc, ub.created_by as createdBy, ub.created_on as createdOn, ub.updated_by as updatedBy, ub.updated_on as updatedOn
mapper.select: SELECT FROM user_branch ub order by ub.branch_name asc
